## Feed Page reader.feedPage.loading.noThread=We could not force the loading of articles for this new source, because the fetcher is not started. reader.feedPage.loading.failed=There was a problem while forcing the loading of articles for this source.

## Press Review reader.pr.noMatchedArticle=Oops, no article match the criteria given for this press review. reader.pr.preview=Preview reader.pr.previewWarning=Below is a preview of the press review you are about to create. **Showing only {0,choice,1#is matching article|1<are {0} matching articles} out of {1}**. reader.pr.selectFormatterLabel=Select a formatter reader.pr.selectFormatterHint=The formatter you select will determine how the resulting press review will look like. reader.pr.refresh=Refresh preview reader.pr.create=Create this press review reader.pr.pageNameLabel=Name of the press review page reader.pr.pageNameHint=Enter the name of the page that will hold the press review reader.pr.selectFormatter=1. Select press review format reader.pr.createPressReview=2. Create the press review reader.pr.pagenameValue=Press Review for {0} reader.pr.prPageAlreadyExists=The page **{0}** already exists in this space. Please pick up another page name for your press review reader.pr.table.doc.creator=Creator reader.pr.table.doc.creationDate=Created on reader.pr.table.doc.title=Press review title reader.pr.table.comment=Comment reader.pr.table.emptyvalue= reader.pr.defaultHeaderMessage=Press review created by {0} on {1} reader.pr.createPressReviewWithSelection=Create a press review with this selection reader.pr.pressReviewDisabledSelectionIsTooLarge=The press review creation is disabled because your selection matches more articles than the maximum allowed number. Maximum number of articles is {0}. reader.pr.defaultFormatter.originalArticleByAndFrom=Original article by [[{0} on {1}>>{2}]], published on {3}. reader.pr.defaultFormatter.annotations=Annotations reader.pr.defaultFormatter.comments=Comments reader.pr.pressReviewListEmpty=No press review has been published yet reader.pr.viewAllPressReviewsForSpace=→ See all press reviews for space {0} reader.pr.viewAllPressReviews=→ See all press reviews
## OPML reader.opmlImport.introduction=The OPML importer will allow you to import your subscriptions from other services. You need to provide us with a valid [[OPML file>>http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OPML]] that you would have previously exported from an other service (for example from Google Reader). reader.opmlImport.noAttachment=Attach your OPML file to this document reader.opmImport.failedToLoadFile=We could not import your OPML file. Reason : {0} reader.opmlImport.doImport=Import selected sources reader.opmlImport.selectAll=select all reader.opmlImport.unselectAll=unselect all reader.opmlImport.listOfImportedSources=List of imported sources : reader.opmlImport.backToTheImportWizard=Take me back to the import wizard reader.opmlImport.nothingToImport=There was nothing to import. Did you selected any feed ? reader.opmlImport.sourceAlreadyExists=There is already a source with this URL, so it is disabled for the import reader.opmlImport.requiresProgrammingRight=You cannot use the OMPL import because a document needs to be saved by an authorized user. reader.opmlImport.saveWithYourProgrammingRight=You have programming access level. [[Click this link to save {0} with your programming right>>{1}]]. You will be redirected to this page automatically. reader.opmlImport.ignoredFeedWithoutTitle=Ignored feed without a title : {0}
